attributes.name: description
attributes.value: Analyze sentiment of text and return score

attributes.name: description
attributes.value: Transform data from one format to another

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Inspect the tool nodes (sentiment_analyzer and data_transformer). For each tool, use construct_tool to register them with complete input_schema, output_schema, and an implementation strategy. For sentiment_analyzer, use 'agent_backed' strategy. For data_transformer, use 'code_generation' strategy with sample JavaScript code.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Use the sentiment_analyzer tool to analyze: 'This is a great product!'. Then use data_transformer to convert some sample JSON to YAML format.
